tags: cascadia font windowsterminal terminal mono monospace

cascadiaFonts.description: This package contains Microsoft's Cascadia family of fonts, including Cascadia Code, Cascadia Code PL (Cascadia Code with powerline symbols), Cascadia Mono, and Cascadia Mono PL (Cascadia Mono with powerline symbols).
cascadiaFonts.releaseNotes: Updated for {{cascadiaVersion}} release of Cascadia font family
cascadiaFonts.tags: code cascadiacode cascadiacodepl cascadiamono cascadiamonopl powerline

cascadiaCode.description: This is Microsoft's Cascadia Code font, originally designed for the new Windows Terminal.
cascadiaCode.releaseNotes: Updated for {{cascadiaVersion}} release of Cascadia Code

cascadiaMono.description: This is Microsoft's Cascadia Mono font, based on Cascadia Code but without ligatures, originally designed for the new Windows Terminal.
cascadiaMono.releaseNotes: Updated for {{cascadiaVersion}} release of Cascadia Mono

cascadiaCodePL.description: This is Microsoft's Cascadia Code PL font (Cascadia Code with powerline symbols), originally designed for the new Windows Terminal.
cascadiaCodePL.releaseNotes: Updated for {{cascadiaVersion}} release of Cascadia Code PL

cascadiaMonoPL.description: This is Microsoft's Cascadia Mono PL font (Cascadia Mono with powerline symbols), based on Cascadia Code but without ligatures, originally designed for the new Windows Terminal.
cascadiaMonoPL.releaseNotes: Updated for {{cascadiaVersion}} release of Cascadia Mono PL
